meanings: (몸을 감추다) hide, (formal) conceal oneself, be in hiding; (재빨리) duck; (사라지다) disappear

vlive.korean: 그때 총 쏠 때 왜 숨어있었어요? Why were you hiding during shooting? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] SF9 x 우리의 밤 (Our Night with SF9)
vlive.english: Why were you hiding during shooting?

vlive.korean: 어디서 숨어있을... 카메라가 왜 여기 있을까? Where is he hiding...Why is camera there? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.21
vlive.english: Where is he hiding...Why is camera there?

vlive.korean: [계단 뒤에 슈가 있어요] - 슈가 여기 숨어있어 - 슈가 형 숨어있다! [SUGA is hiding behind the stairs] - SUGA is hiding here! - SUGA is hiding here! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.108
vlive.english: [SUGA is hiding behind the stairs] - SUGA is hiding here! - SUGA is hiding here!

vlive.korean: [숨어!! 도망가!!] [Hide! Run away!] View video IU : [IU TV] 투 머치 토커 아이유
숨어 듣는 명곡 하나 추천해주는 거 해볼까? Shall we recommend a hidden masterpiece? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 노래 듣고픈 캐럿들 모여랍👐
vlive.english: Shall we recommend a hidden masterpiece?

examples.korean: There was someone skulking behind the bushes. 발음듣기 덤불 뒤에 누군가가 몰래 숨어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There was someone skulking behind the bushes. 발음

examples.korean: His soft words contained an undertone of warning. 발음듣기 그의 부드러운 말 속에는 경고의 뜻이 숨어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His soft words contained an undertone of warning. 발음

examples.korean: A crocodile was lurking just below the surface. 발음듣기 악어 한 마리가 수면 바로 아래에 숨어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A crocodile was lurking just below the surface. 발음

examples.korean: We spent months in hiding. 발음듣기 우리는 몇 달 동안 숨어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We spent months in hiding. 발음

examples.korean: I knew where he was hiding. 발음듣기 나는 그가 어디 숨어 있는지 알고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I knew where he was hiding. 발음
